Title: Relates to the definition of qualified reservation for taxation purposes
Summary: Provides that lands held by the Cayuga Indian Nation of New York shall not be considered a qualified reservation for purposes of certain tax law and real property tax law provisions.
LawCode: Amd ยง470, Tax L; amd ยง6, Indian L; amd ยง454, RPT L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, the Indian law and the real property tax law, in relation to the definition of "qualified reservation"
